Sentinel Eriel:
Yes, bring the wind whispers peace to your soul. My name is Eriel. I refuse to accept peace with the Dark Elves, and therefore volunteered to guard the neutral zone and ensure that they are not penetrated into our forests.
Incidentally, the neutral zone is located directly behind this bridge. And if you go further south, you will find yourself in Town of Gludio. It is near to the Elves human settlements.
